data.title: Montgomery County Animal Services & Adoption Center
data.text:
Hours Open to the Public:

Monday: 12:00pm- 7:00pm

Tuesday: 12:00pm- 7:00pm

Wednesday: 12:00pm- 5:00pm

Thursday: 12:00pm-7:00pm

Friday: 12:00pm-7:00pm

Saturday: 12:00pm-5:00pm

Sunday: 12:00pm-5:00pm

*Adoption Center CLOSED to public on county government holidays.

A non-profit partner of the Montgomery County Animal Services and Adoption Center (MCASAC)

helping to educate, advocate & take action on the healthy treatment and well being of animals both inside & outside MCASAC.

County Executiveâ€™s Customer Service Commitment

Montgomery County Government is committed to providing exceptional service to our many diverse communities, residents and businesses. I encourage you to contact me if you feel that you have not received excellent service, or have compliments or other comments related to the service you received from your county government.

-Marc Elrich, Montgomery County Executive

Click here to email County Executive Marc Elrich
